metadata.title: Devil Express - A Narrative Adventure Game
metadata.description: Explore the cursed apartment block in Devil Express, a 2D adventure game filled with monsters, magic, and mystery. Unveil secrets and make friends along the way.
metadata.keywords: Devil Express, adventure game, 2D game, narrative game, mystery game, Devil Express download

hero.p: Step into a surreal world of monsters and magic with Devil Express, a narrative-focused 2D adventure game. Discover the secrets of a mysterious apartment block that defies reality.

gameFeatures.title: Key Features of Devil Express
features: One hour of high-paced delivery action
Themes of loss, labor, and self-discovery
Playable as a downloadable executable or in-browser

gameplayInstructions.title: How to Play Devil Express
instructions: Move using W / A or Left / Right Arrow keys
Interact with Spacebar or Up Arrow key
Access Inventory with Tab or "i" key
Explore different floors and uncover mysteries
Engage with characters to solve puzzles

questions.question: What platforms is Devil Express available on?
questions.answer: Devil Express is available on HTML5 and Windows platforms.

questions.question: Is Devil Express translated into other languages?
questions.answer: Yes, the game has a complete Spanish translation available for download.

questions.question: What is the average gameplay time for Devil Express?
questions.answer: The average session lasts about an hour.

questions.question: Can I play Devil Express on my browser?
questions.answer: Yes, you can play it as a downloadable executable or directly in your browser.

questions.question: Who developed the game's art and music?
questions.answer: Art was done by Shuteye and the music was created by 7wave.
